actionConfiguration.body:
update finance_trip_invoices as u set -- postgres FTW
	vat = u2.vat,
	ait= u2.ait,
	updated_at = now()
from (values
			('DGI-OCT-22-2388',0,5823.88),
('ENV-OCT-22-2392',25690.86,12845.52)

) as u2(invoice_number,vat,ait)
where u2.invoice_number = u.invoice_number
and u.invoice_number in ('DGI-OCT-22-2388',
'ENV-SEP-22-2213/9'

)
;
